name: Faith No More
description:
A mini-sci-fi-kind-of-interactive-comic/game about the consequences of finding answers to great questions and things like that (also a prelude to a game I would really like to do some day). Has nothing to do with the otherwise awesome band.

Made in a week as a small experiment (and as a prelude to a longer game I would like to do one day).

All music by Ben Burnes, plundered from his awesome gamedev-oriented Three Red Hearts: Prepare to Dev Edition chiptune album.

Webpage
